name: kiarash-portfolio-mcp
description: WebMCP-enabled portfolio with Ed25519 signed discovery. AI agents can query projects, skills, and execute terminal commands via HTTP API.
author: Kiarash Adl

tools.name: get_project_details
tools.description: Get detailed info about portfolio projects

tools.name: run_terminal_command
tools.description: Execute terminal commands: about, skills, projects, contact
